  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030609</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030609</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">La Hidrosfera</string>
            <string language="en">The hydrosphere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Hydrosphere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'hydrosphère</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O hydrosphere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il hydrosphere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η υδρόσφαιρα</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Define qué es la Hidrosfera, analiza cómo se distribuye y en qué proporción en la Tierra y enlaza con una ampliación sobre las propiedades del agua.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic defining the hydrosphere, analysing how it is distributed and on what proportion of the earth and linking to additional information about the properties of water.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Hidrosfera</string>
            <string language="en">Hydrosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geología</string>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, das den Hydrosphere, analysierend 
definiert, wie es verteilt wird und auf welchem Anteil der Masse und 
der Bindung zu den zusätzlichen Informationen über die Eigenschaften
des Wassers.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet définissant l'hydrosphère, analysant 
comment on lui distribue et sur quelle proportion de la terre et de 
joindre avec des informations supplémentaires sur les propriétés de
l'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que define o hydrosphere, analisando como
se distribui e em que proporção da terra e de ligar à informação 
adicional sobre as propriedades da água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che definisce il hydrosphere, 
analizzante come è distribuito e su che proporzione della terra e di 
collegamento con informazioni supplementari sulle proprietà di acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που καθορίζει την υδρόσφαιρα, που αναλύει πώς 
διανέμεται και σε ποιο ποσοστό της γης και της σύνδεσης στις 
πρόσθετες πληροφορίες για τις ιδιότητες του ύδατος.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hydrosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Hydrosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hydrosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biosfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
